title: Ticket #638: Missing description of run_as_owner in manual
description:
condor_submit accepts a "run_as_owner" option on Windows. The description of what can go in a submit file makes an oblique reference to run_as_owner here: http://www.cs.wisc.edu/condor/manual/v7.2/2_5Submitting_Job.html#2337

However, I cannot find any documentation in the submit file section of run_as_owner, and it's not in the index. (We do document STARTER_ALLOW_RUNAS_OWNER though.)

I'm also confused, because condor_submit only seems to accept run_as_owner on Windows, but this part of the manual seems to suggest that the option should exist on Windows: http://www.cs.wisc.edu/condor/manual/v7.2/3_6Security.html#sec:RunAsNobody

This should be clarified by someone that understands it.
remarks: Added the missing definition of run_as_owner, as well as reference links that should help to clarify the configuration and condor_credd administrative part of the set up.
